name: v2.0.4: Updated packages and Flutter. Minor fixes applied.
body:
## Changes

- Replaced Equatable with Freezed.
- Fixed some minor bugs.

name: v2.0.2: Fix calendar deletion before connection reached.
v2.0.0: Architecture Rewrite
body:
# Changelog

## Fixes

- Fix #91
- Fix #105, by replacing Facebook by Twitter
- Fix #106, thanks to State Management
- Fix #108

## Changes

### General

- Changed file structure and architecture. Following partially Clean Architecture. This include :
   - 3 Layers : Data, Domain, and Presentation
   - Core has been splitted
   - Data is composed of Models, Data Sources and Repositories Implementations
   - Domain is composed of Entities, Repositories
   - Presentation is composed of Widgets and BLoC
   - Following Repositories Pattern
   - Following Dependency Injection Principle with Factories and LazySingletons
- Changed Migrated Provider to BLoC + GetIt
- Replaced all Unit Tests : Added Data Sources, Models, Entities and Repositories Unit tests
- Updated Flutter requirements. Using now `generated_plugin_registrant`.
- Many others optimizations

### UI

- "Force Dark Theme" is replaced by "Dark/Light/Adaptive"
- Font management changed to classic management. (Using `Theme.of`)
- Font is now using `google_font`

### Portal

- Re-added Promethee
- Re-added Campus
- Fixed Minitel Wiki link

### News

- Migrated to Twitter
- Everything can now be in cache
- Github Feed is now using Markdown Formatting

### Agenda

- Major Optimizations

### Reporting

- Slack Bot updated.
- Diagnosis less buggy.

### Documentation

- Replaced by Minitel Wiki WebView

### About

- License MIT 2020

name: v1.3.0: Localization english and italian
body:
# v1.3.0: Localization english and italian

## Changelog

### General

- Localization: English-translated 
- Localization: Italiano-tradotto 
- Android: Minimum SDK upgraded to 18
- Android: Wake Lock
- Android: Disable Google Drive auto backup
- Various optimizations (one line of code can sometime equal to two)

### Portal

- Secure Storage: Added. Password is now encrypted.
- Portal: Added new time authentication
- Portal: Fixed no snackbar at start
- Stormshield API: Do not catch errors. Added custom exceptions.

### Reporting

- Zabbix View: Fixed Wrap alignment

name: v0.6.0
body:
# v0.6.0

## Changelog

### Android

Android: Dependencies migrated to AndroidX (junit, runner, espresso)
Android: Upgrade Kotlin to 1.3.50

### Github API (Version Checker)

Version Checker: Migrated to Github API
Version Checker: HD Upgrade, now, it shows changelog and can download differents ABI
News: Using now Github API, close #71 

### Others

Provider: Organization
Others: Naming stuffs (code)
Unit Tests: Mocked HTTP Requests and Responses

name: Public Beta Release
body:
# Public Beta Release :tada: 

## Changelog

### Portail

- Portail: Work in Progress, waiting for WebView to be able to set cookies
- Portail: Cookies are now using "Cookie" object from dart:io
- Portail: Able to set Cookie, close #46 and close #20 (aw yea baby)

### Agenda

- ICalendar: Major reorganizations and optimizations

### Others

- Integrations Tests: Authentication, News, Reporting, Docs, Navigation, close #4 and close #64 
- VS Code Remote: Container added
- Slack: New channel
- Facebook API: Do not use API for profile pic
- Android: Adaptative Icon, close #32 
- Various optimizations (and styling)

## Hotfix 0.5.1

### Changelog

- Webview: Use back button instead of IconButton

## Roadmap

- 0.5.1+1: Test unitaires avec requte HTTP mock

- 1.0: Release fin Septembre (et documentation minimum)

- 1.1: Dark Theme
